plot: In Baghdad, in 8th century, the Caliph Haroun Al Rachid is a man for whom the human life has only not much value. But when his dearest friend the grand vizier arrives terrified, his vision of the death is irreparably going to change.
title: Samarkande
plot_es: In Baghdad, in 8th century, the Caliph Haroun Al Rachid is a man for whom the human life has only not much value. But when his dearest friend the grand vizier arrives terrified, his vision of the death is irreparably going to change.
plot_en: In Baghdad, in 8th century, the Caliph Haroun Al Rachid is a man for whom the human life has only not much value. But when his dearest friend the grand vizier arrives terrified, his vision of the death is irreparably going to change.
